name: EventInfo
0:
”Alexa, ask event info for the concerts near Rochester, New York this weekend.”
”Alexa, ask event info to list the technology events near boston Massachusetts tonight.”
”Alexa, ask event info for art information near chicago Illinois tomorrow.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: event info
des:
Event Info provides information on events happening in your area.

You can ask for what concerts, religious, technology and many other types of events are going on in your area, today, tomorrow, this weekend and several other time periods.

Ask for help for the details on all the types of events as well as the supported time periods.

Event information provided by eventful.com
